item.title: Setting the amount of xp you get per hit on a monster?
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

i don’t recomend this, as it giving me problems with my hps on log in but search

double till you come to some code that looks like this

TotalExp = (double) (### * hitDiff);

the ## are the amount of xp you want to give to, for 30k xp it would be hard to do that exactly but id say put

TotalExp = (double) (1000 * hitDiff);

there is a lot of these codes for each diferent attack style if you want your server to be hard xp and give you the amount of xp you hit EX, i hit 16, i get 16 xp set that number to 1
hope i helped =D
